patthana16.40:1.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṃsa.
patthana16.40:2.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā chabbīsa …pe… avigate chabbīsa.
